metadata.description: WordPress publishing skill with full Gutenberg block support, automatic category selection, SEO tag generation, and preview capabilities

plugins.name: wordpress-publisher
plugins.description: Publish content directly to WordPress sites via REST API with full Gutenberg block support. Create and publish posts/pages, auto-load and select categories from website, generate SEO-optimized tags, preview articles before publishing, and generate Gutenberg blocks for tables, images, lists, and rich formatting. Use when: user wants to publish to WordPress, post to blog, create WordPress article, update WordPress post, convert markdown to Gutenberg blocks.
